metrics.name: Total number of open opportunities
metrics.description: Total number of currently open opportunities

metrics.name: Total number of closed opportunities
metrics.description: Total number of currently closed opportunities

metrics.name: Win/loss ratio
metrics.description: Ratio of won to lost opportunities. A value > 1 indicates that there are more opportunities won than lost.

metrics.name: Average lead conversion time
metrics.description: Average time from lead creation to lead conversion

metrics.name: Average lead response time
metrics.description: Average time from lead creation to working on lead
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE NOT event_name IN (${lto_sf_lead_created_events})))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE event_name IN (${lto_sf_lead_created_events})))
   )

metrics.name: Average opportunity win time
metrics.description: Average time from creating the opportunity to winning the opportunity

metrics.name: Average opportunity lost time
metrics.description: Average time from creating the opportunity to loosing the opportunity

metrics.name: Opportunities without lead
metrics.description: Total number of opportunities without lead

metrics.name: Average touchpoints per case
metrics.description: Average number of touchpoints per case

metrics.name: No-touch leads
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE 
		(SELECT 
			BOOL_AND( NOT event_name IN (${lto_sf_touchpoint_events})) 
			AND BOOL_OR( event_name IN (${lto_sf_lead_created_events})) 
		)
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Low-touch conversions
metrics.description: Number of converted leads with less interactions than specified

metrics.name: Number of created quotes
Number of approved quotes
Number of rejected quotes
Quote to close ratio
metrics.description: Fraction of quotes that end up as won opportunities.

metrics.name: Total quote volume
metrics.description: Total financial volume of quotes provided to potential clients.

metrics.name: Average quote volume
metrics.description: Average financial volume of quotes provided to potential clients.

variables.name: lto_sf_close_opp_events
variables.description: Events indicating that an opportunity was closed, for example 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won'

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won','Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Lost','Update Opportunity Stage to: 06 Closed Won (Onboarding)','Update Opportunity Stage to: 5 Closed - Renewal Confirmed'

variables.name: lto_sf_lead_identifier
variables.description: Attribute that identifies a lead, for example "LeadId"

variables.name: lto_sf_lead_created_date
variables.description: Attribute containing the creation date of a lead, for example "LeadCreatedDate"

variables.name: lto_sf_lead_created_events
variables.description: Events indicating that a lead was created, for example 'Create Lead'

variables.name: lto_sf_lead_converted_date
variables.description: Attribute that contains the conversion date of a lead, for example "LeadConvertedDate"

variables.name: lto_sf_lead_assigned
variables.description: Event indicating that a lead was assigned, for example 'Assign Lead Owner'

variables.name: lto_sf_opp_created_date
variables.description: Attribute containing the creation date of an opportunity, for example "OppCreatedDate"

variables.name: lto_sf_opp_closed_date
variables.description: Attribute containing the closing date of an opportunity, for example "OppCloseDate"

variables.name: lto_sf_opp_lost_condition
variables.description: Condition indicating that an opportunity is lost, for example "OppIsWon" = 'FALSE'

variables.name: lto_sf_opp_won_condition
variables.description: Condition indicating that an opportunity is won, for example "OppIsWon" = 'TRUE'

variables.name: lto_sf_touchpoint_events
variables.description: Events that describe a touchpoint, for example 'Log Activity: Call', 'Log Activity: Email'

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Log Activity: Call', 'Log Activity: Email', 'Log Activity: Task', 'Log Activity: Task (Sent Email)', 'Log Activity: Task (Call)','Log Activity: Task (Social Connect)','Log Activity: Task (Demo Preparation)','Log Activity: Task (Discovery / Qualification)','Log Activity: Task (Custom Online Demo)','Log Activity: Task (Standard Online Demo)','Log Activity: Task (Questionnaire)','Log Activity: Task (Web Demo)'

variables.name: lto_sf_number_of_touchpoints
variables.description: Threshold for classifying a case as "low-touch case", for example 3

variables.name: lto_sf_conversion_events
variables.description: Events indicating that a case was converted, for example 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won', 'Lead Converted'

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won','Update Opportunity Stage to: 06 Closed Won (Onboarding)'

variables.name: lto_sf_quote_created
variables.description: Events indicating that a quote was created, for example 'Create Quote'

variables.name: lto_sf_quote_approved
variables.description: Events indicating that a quote was approved, for example 'Approve Quote'

variables.name: lto_sf_quote_rejected
variables.description: Events indicating that a quote was rejected, for example 'Reject Quote'

variables.name: lto_sf_quote_to_opp_condition
variables.description: Sequence of events that describes the process of quotes ending up as won opportunities, for example 'Create Quote' ~> 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won'

defaultValues.defaultValue:
'Create Quote'
	~> ('Opportunity closed (won)' | 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won' | 'Update Opportunity Stage to: 06 Closed Won (Onboarding)')
